post:
GeoWirx, Inc. is proud to announce our grand opening to our XEN VPS hosting packages!

GeoWirx, Inc. specializes in providing highly reliable hosting solutions to all of our clients. Our servers are located in the Chicago Metro area.

We are currently running our grand opening VPS sale at a very affordable rate. These specials are a limited time offer only! During sign up customers enter the coupons provided below.

There is a 1 coupon per customer limit (first 20 customers!). Available to new customers only!

We are offering an introductory price and giving the same high quality services that many customers are looking towards.

We highly look for customer input in order to better ourselves as a company and in order to provide quality solutions at the fraction of the cost.


Xen VPS Hosting:
-----------------

GEO-VPS1
6 GB Space
128 GB Transfer
128 MB RAM
256 MB SWAP
128 CPU UNITS
1-Month Contract:
WAS: $20 / month
Special: $ 10 / MONTH (FOR LIFE)
Coupon Code: GEO1 - FIRST 20 CUSTOMERS ONLY!

Order Today at:
https://billing.geowirx.com/signup.php?clienttype=11

Check out our other XEN VPS Hosting plans at:
http://geowirx.com/index.php?page=vpshosting
